Articles.Content:
So, I've been working on improving my plane building skills and this is what i came up with:

What i will probably post most of is planes, but i may do some rockets too.

HB-W

Hyper Bull-White Random name is random.

This design is heavily based on a plane called K-1 (Found at http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17752-Zepto-Labs-Where-every-explosion-is-possible!) , but I've not directly copied it. It's basically a small ''Fighter jet'' and it's really fast too! It may be ugly, but damn it handles.

It's easily capable of 140 M/S but struggles once it's at 185 or so.

http://www./?3qrss2646q41137

So if you have any ideas/improvements i will try to follow them, and requests may or may not be done depending on how hard they are, and how well i succeed with trying them out before releasing them.

Edited September 18, 2012 by 42undead2
